::FireBlade::
FireBlade's sword slided through fairly hard. His sword was created
well to not bending at all...blue flames jumping off the blade....
He flipped around IR's face going right into his then the teeth...the
teeth are what scared him...With quick thinking he pulled his arm back
leaving the blue flame coverd sword in the path of the alien teeth. At
the same time a small device on his shoulder launched to firegrenades
at the head of this beast.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
>
> * Iron Raptor hissed as she ducked under the first shots sent by
FireBlade.
> This foe might be tougher then she'd hoped for. But he was still
pray none
> the less.
> She was about to resume wrapping around him when two grenades sent him
> flying towards her...sword tip first.
> < Ak!>
> Her mind quickly calculated exactly what sort of damage that sword
would
> cause before it even reached her.
> Would it pierce her armor plated exo-structure?
> Better believe it!
> Would it damage any vital circuits?
> No.
> How deep would it go in?
> Not far, but enough to cause a good sized scar after the fight.
> So the sword wasn't a concern, but to minimize the damage IR moved
the best
> she could so that the blade would hit her shoulder...leaving
FireBlade's
> body vulnerable to attack.
> And so it struck, the blade going in only a quarter of the way to
contact
> the thick plating of her shoulder that kept her circuits safe. It
was hard
> enough that if the blade struck too hard it would either bend or
crack the
> blade.
> She had been built well by her creators, and twice as well by the
Matrix.
> Iron Raptor then looked over her shoulder at FireBlade, swinging her
head
> around so that it would be less then an inch from his.
> Her large, clawed hand came to try and grab at his arm that held the
sword,
> intended on ripping it free from it's socket or at least making him
let go
> of the sword.
> She bared her silver 7 inch long teeth.*
>
> " Big mistake!"
>
> * Her voice boomed as she spat acid at FireBlade's face.*
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
